access: A character who is a member of the Hellknights has access to this option.
markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 12"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Hellknight Order Cross-Training](/Feats.aspx?ID=1077) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Character Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=12) pg. 83 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Hellknight Armiger](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=20)

**Prerequisites**
[Hellknight Armiger Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=907); [Hellknight Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1078) or [Hellknight Signifer Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1082)

**Access**
A character who is a member of the Hellknights has access to this option.

</column>

---

You gain the lesser order benefit of a Hellknight order other than the one to which you belong. This represents your time spent training with members of that order to learn their techniques and teachings. If you aren’t in good standing with a given order, you can’t receive their training.

**Special** You can select this feat multiple times, gaining the lesser order benefit from a different order each time by training with members of that order.
name: Hellknight Order Cross-Training
prerequisite: Hellknight Armiger Dedication; Hellknight Dedication or Hellknight Signifer Dedication
